ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Electrostaff_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Electrostaff
ThingDef.description: An electrostaff was a staff-like melee weapon manufactured by Baktoid Armor Workshop and Holowan Mechanicals. They were used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems' IG-100 MagnaGuard.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Vibroblade_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Vibroblade
ThingDef.description: A vibroblade, also styled as vibro-blade, was a bladed knife used for basic utility needs or as a melee weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Vibrosword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Vibrosword
ThingDef.description: Like all vibro-weapons, it was dangerous to use vibroswords against electrical weapons, as they conducted electricity, therefore, electrocuting the user of the sword.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Vibroaxe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Vibroaxe
ThingDef.description: The Vibroaxe is a close-combat weapon in the Star Wars universe, featuring a heavy, hand-held axe with a vibroblade that can cut through armor and hard materials. It is often used by soldiers and mercenaries, and requires strength and skill to wield effectively.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_SE-14_Light_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SE-14 Light Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: The SE-14 was used by the B1-Series battle droids of the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars and was referred to as the Separatist blaster pistol.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_E-5_Blaster_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona E-5 Blaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: The E-5 blaster rifle was manufactured by Baktoid Armor Workshop on order from the Trade Federation for their Droid Army.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_E-5C_Blaster_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona E-5C Blaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: The E-5C blaster rifle was manufactured by Baktoid Armor Workshop on order from the Trade Federation for their Droid Army.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_E-5S_Sniper_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona E-5S Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: The E-5s sniper rifle was a 4-shot rifle produced by Baktoid Armor Workshop and used by the Battle droid assassins of the Trade Federation and the Separatist Droid Army.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_EE-3_Carbine_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona EE-3 Carbine Rifle
ThingDef.description: It was an optically fitted blaster rifle capable of three-round burst fire at long ranges, but had lower accuracy and stopping power compared to larger rifles\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_B2_Wrist_Blaster_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona B2 Super Droid Wrist Blaster
ThingDef.description: Built-in double blaster cannon (Wrist blaster).\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_B2_HA_Wrist_Cannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona B2-HA Super Droid Wrist Cannon
ThingDef.description: Built-in Snigle blaster cannon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.description: built-in blaster cannons for AQ battle Droid\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.description: Long Blaster made for the Droideka sniper\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_LR-57_Combat_Blaster_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona LR-57 Combat Blaster
ThingDef.description: In-build blaster for LR-57 Droid\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_DC-17_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona DC-17 Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: Like all blasters of the DC-line manufactured by BlasTech Industries, the DC-17 hand blaster fired blue plasma projectiles that were hyper-ionized to be especially devastating against droids while retaining its lethality against organic beings.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_DC-17S_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona DC-17S Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: Like all blasters of the DC-line manufactured by BlasTech Industries. Base on the DC-17 Blaster pistol with an extender.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_DC-15S_Blaster_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona DC-15S Blaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: Smaller in scale than the DC-15A blaster rifle, the DC-15S blaster lacked its larger cousin's range, but was easier to handle than its bulkier cousin with a higher rate of fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_DC-15A_Blaster_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona DC-15A Blaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: The DC-15A blaster rifle was one of the standard issue weapons for clone troopers. While the use of blasters allowed a clone trooper to carry significantly more ammunition than a projectile weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_DC-15x_Sniper_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona DC-15x Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: It was a modified version of the DC-15A sniper rifle, dealing more damage, but containing less shots.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Z6_Rotary_Blaster_Cannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Z6 Rotary Blaster Cannon
ThingDef.description: The Z-6 rotary blaster cannon was a powerful rotating blaster cannon chaingun developed by Merr-Sonn Munitions.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Westar-33_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Westar-33 Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Westar-33 is a blaster pistol used in Star Wars that fires energy bolts and is popular among soldiers and bounty hunters. It has a moderate rate of fire and small ammo capacity, but is reliable and durable.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Westar-34_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Westar-34 Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: The WESTAR-34 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol manufactured by Concordian Crescent Technologies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona Westar-35 Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: The WESTAR-35 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol manufactured by Concordian Crescent Technologies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Westar-44_Heavy_Blaster_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Westar-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol
ThingDef.description: The WESTAR-44 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol manufactured by Concordian Crescent Technologies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Westar-M5_Blaster_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Westar-M5 Blaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: They were mainly used by the Alpha-class Advanced Recon Commandos during the later years of the conflict.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_M-56_Heavy_Blaster_Cannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M-56 Heavy Blaster Cannon
ThingDef.description: The M-56 Heavy Blaster Cannon is a powerful weapon used in the Star Wars universe. It is a heavy-duty blaster that fires concentrated bolts of energy and is capable of causing significant damage to its target. The M-56 is often mounted on vehicles, such as speeder bikes or starfighters, and can also be carried and used by infantry soldiers. It has a high rate of fire and a large ammo capacity, making it a formidable weapon on the battlefield. Despite its destructive capabilities, the M-56 is difficult to handle due to its size and weight, requiring a strong and skilled operator to use it effectively.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JDSA_Amban_Blaster_Rilfe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Amban Blaster Rilfe
ThingDef.description: The Amban phase-pulse blaster, also known as an Amban sniper rifle, was a type of disruptor sniper rifle used by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
